header: 3ML-Master 2.0: ultra-long-horizon MLE agent with cognitive accumulation

images.caption: Figure 1:The ML-Master 2.0 Framework for Ultra-Long-Horizon Autonomous MLE via Cognitive Accumulation. HC and CM represent hierarchical caching and context migration respectively.
Figure 2:An example of context migration in taskplant-pathology-2021-fgvc8.

Figure 3:The growth of context length when ML-Master 2.0 is handling the taskrandom-acts-of-pizza. The orange line represents the full context length while the blue line represents the context length in HCC. ML-Master 2.0 successfully limits the peak context length from more than 200k to approximately 70k tokens and secures a medal during the fourth iteration of the research plan proposal and verification.
Figure 4:ML-Master 2.0 continues improving its solution over time.
